tool_description: Applies image processing techniques to improve document scan quality for better OCR accuracy, including noise reduction, contrast enhancement, and skew correction.

input_file_path.description: Path to the input image file to enhance

auto_deskew.description: Automatically correct document skew and rotation

noise_reduction.description: Apply noise reduction algorithms to clean up artifacts

error_messages: Invalid image file: The specified file is not a valid image format or is corrupted. Ensure the file is a supported image type.
Enhancement level invalid: Use one of [light, standard, aggressive] for enhancement_level parameter.
Contrast value out of range: contrast_boost must be between 0.5 and 3.0. Adjust the value within the valid range.
Image processing failed: Enhancement algorithms could not process the image. The image may be too damaged or in an unsupported format.
usage: Provide the input_file_path to an image that needs quality enhancement. Configure enhancement_level, auto_deskew, noise_reduction, and contrast_boost based on the document condition. The tool outputs an enhanced image optimized for OCR.

enhanced_file_path.description: Path to the enhanced output image file

quality_improvement_score.description: Numeric score (0-100) indicating the degree of quality improvement achieved

processing_time.description: Time taken for enhancement processing in seconds

enhancements_applied.description: List of specific enhancements that were applied to the image
